item.title: Best I Am a Killer Episodes
item.description: Death row inmates convicted of capital murder give a firsthand account of their crimes in this documentary series. I am a Killer is an American crime documentary series that was first aired in 2018 on Netflix. See the best episodes of I Am a Killer below.

item.title: Best Trailer Park Boys Episodes
item.description: Ricky, Julian and Bubbles are about to get out of jail, and this time, Julian vows to go straight, even open a legit business. Soon the Boys will all be rich. At least that’s what they’ve told the parole board. But when they arrive back at the park, they find it’s not the same old Sunnyvale - and it’s not the same old Jim Lahey, Trailer Park Supervisor. See the best episodes of Trailer Park Boys below.

item.title: Best Episodes of Reno 911!
item.description: This partially unscripted comedy brings viewers into the squad car as incompetent officers swing into action, answering 911 calls about everything from speeding violations and prostitution to staking out a drug den. Within each episode, viewers catch a ‘fly on the wall’ glimpse of the cops' often politically incorrect opinions, ranging from their personal feelings to professional critiques of their colleagues. See the best Reno 911 episodes below.

item.title: Best Episodes of the First 48
item.description: The First 48 follows detectives from around the country during these first critical hours as they race against time to find the suspect. Gritty and fast-paced, it takes viewers behind the scenes of real-life investigations with unprecedented access to crime scenes, autopsies, forensic processing, and interrogations. See The First 48 best episodes below.

item.title: Best Episodes of Monk
item.description: Adrian Monk was once a rising star with the San Francisco Police Department, legendary for using unconventional means to solve the department’s most baffling cases. But after the tragic (and still unsolved) murder of his wife Trudy, he developed an extreme case of obsessive-compulsive disorder. Now working as a private consultant, Monk continues to investigate cases in the most unconventional ways. See best Monk episodes below.

item.title: Best Episodes of Law and Order
item.description: Follows a crime (usually a murder), usually adapted from current headlines, from two separate vantage points, the police investigation and the prosecution in court. Law and Order is an American police and legal drama tv series that was first premiered in 1990. See the best Law and Order episodes below to binge-watch on.

item.title: Best Episodes of Beyond Scared Straight
item.description: Observing programs for troubled teens in which inmates reveal the realities of prison life in the hope of deterring them from a life of crime. Each hourlong episode follows a handful of at-risk teenagers as they attend a program, which includes an intensive one-day session in a prison. A month later, the teens are asked what, if any, lasting impressions the program had on them. Some change their ways following the experience while others continue down the same path they were on before.See the best Beyond Scared Straight episodes below.

item.title: The Mentalist Best Episodes
item.description: Patrick Jane, a former celebrity psychic medium, uses his razor sharp skills of observation and expertise at “reading” people to solve serious crimes with the California Bureau of Investigation. See the best episodes of The Mentalist below.

item.title: Best Criminal Minds Episodes
item.description: An elite team of FBI profilers analyze the country’s most twisted criminal minds, anticipating their next moves before they strike again. The Behavioral Analysis Unit’s most experienced agent is David Rossi, a founding member of the BAU who returns to help the team solve new cases. See the best episodes of Criminal Minds below.
